result.name: The identification of SNP repertoir in microRNA genes in the pig with the use of targeted sequencing approach.
result.description: The aim  of the research was to identify SNP polymorphisms in microRNA genes with the use of targeted DNA sequencing to broaden the general knowledge of these genes and the repertoir of SNPs in the pig, and the influence of SNPs on miRNA functioning.
result.center: National Research Institute of Animal Production
